attributes.action: Reimburse student accommodation rent as COVID-19 force universities to close
attributes.additional_details:
It does not make sense for students to stay in university accommodation when there are no face-to-face lectures taking place. 
This means that students will be paying for a vacant room for the next few months.
attributes.background: Action against unfair rental charges for university accommodation when they are forced to close, by the Government, due to the pandemic. The Government should wave off or reimburse the rent.
